title: 11 Best Standing Exercises (No Jumping) To Lose Weight At Home
description:
Who says you can't do exercises when you're having knee pain, knee problems, or lower body issues? Today's workout is here to show how you can still lose weight and burn fat at home even if you and other conditions that might interfere with your ability to exercise!

In today's video workout I have included the best body-weight exercises that will help burn calories but don't require any jumping or excessive effort for your knees and legs. It's an effective low impact workout program to get in shape!

Keep in mind that in order to see results, you would need to perform this workout regularly if not everyday!

Are you ready to begin the workout? Let's go!❤️💪﻿

**If you want to be notified when I upload a new video, make sure to subscribe to our channel. I upload new videos everyday from Sunday to Friday!
channelDescription:
I'm here to help you look and feel great, with effective body weight workouts and exercises.

Burn calories and extra fat with simple workout routines you can easily do at home. No equipment or gym necessary.

New video workouts Monday to Friday and then Sunday as well.
tags: home low impact weight loss workout

comments: I have reduced 7 kg in one and half month with this exercise, dieting, warm water drinking and green tea. I  was so passive and lazy but now i feel so energetic. ☺☺

30 knee raises
30 lateral arm circles
30 skater jumps
30 leg kicks
30 high knee jacks
30 step back jacks
30 side leg raises right
30 side leg raises left
30 punches
30 arm circles
30 prayer pushes
40 side bends

Congratulations! You have successfully completed all the exercises. Good Job!

i've been doing this workout since the third day of movement control order(mco) because of corona (18 March 2020). i started with weight of 71kg and today 23 May 2020 i weight 62.6kg. At first my target is 65kg because i know its gonna be difficult to lose weight but since it passed my target, now i trying to get 60 kg. ouh yes i'm 153cm tall. well i'm kinda short and my bmi still overweight. Hopefully i'll get into the normal bmi range. Wish me luck guys.

*just an update today (14 Nov 2020), my current weight is 60.2kg. It been 2 weeks since I maintain that weight. Hopefullybi can get 55kg.

While watching I done excercise I'll try inshallah from tomorrow onwards daily.
Thank you so much for such a simple excercises .
I have been doing this workout for past two weeks and i see myself transformed already:)
